name: context-bridge
description: A unified library for web apps that enables agentic systems to fetch live page context and screenshots

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && python setup.py sdist bdist_wheel
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -e .
scripts.example: concurrently "cd examples/react-fastapi/backend && python main.py" "cd examples/react-fastapi/frontend && npm run dev"

author: Context Bridge Team
